version_description:
• The theory test questions now reflect the real test by requiring just 1 answer from 4 options, making them easier to read and understand
• An updated copy of The Official Highway Code
• Information about the ban on smoking in private cars when children are present

• Bug fix for the Rules of the Road Study section
• Voiceover synchronisation update. This requires users who already have the voiceover files installed to re-download them from within Settings.

Existing users: please read this message carefully BEFORE you update your app. New customers are not affected.

In this update we’ve worked closely with DVSA to streamline and improve the quality of the official revision questions and answers. There are fewer questions than before, but there’s also less repetition. The practice case studies have been reviewed and brought up to date.
If you install this update, any progress you’ve made in the Practice and Mock Test sections will be reset. The Study and Hazard Perception sections won’t be affected.

You should only update your app if you're sure you want to start again with the new question bank.

• Latest PDF of The Highway Code
• Minor updates to questions, study text and extras
• Updates to question audio

• The app is now fully up to date for 2018, including all the latest official revision questions and explanations, the latest case studies and the Official Highway Code.
• Also, in response to your feedback, we’ve added 10 new CGI hazard perception clips entirely free of charge. The Hazard Perception section now has all 20 official CGI clips. Test your skills in a greater variety of situations!
• Several theory test centres have changed their address. Make sure you check the app’s theory test centre locator.
• *Please note* due to the high-quality nature of the CGI videos, the app now requires approximately 700MB of free storage.
• *Please also note* that updating your app to this version will require a resetting of all your Study, Practice & Mock test progress scores. Please be sure you want to do this before proceeding.

What's New text is as follows:
• The Official Highway Code is being updated on 4th June to include new information about learner drivers on motorways, details of MOT-exempt vehicles and revised first-aid information
• The app is now fully up to date and includes study and theory test questions on these subjects
• Also included is the most recent impression of The Official Highway Code
• Please be aware that updating your app to this version will mean that all your progress scores are reset

This is the very latest version of the app for 2019.
We’ve listened to your feedback and have updated some Practice and Mock test questions.
We’ve also added an option for you to tell us if you passed your real theory test as we’d really like to hear your big day result.

We’ve updated some Theory Test centre addresses
We’ve also added a reminder to rate the app and leave your feedback as this helps us to keep improving
We’ve updated some of the theory test questions inline with recent changes to the Highway Code

Good luck with your Theory Test

We’ve updated the app to make sure it contains everything you need to pass your 2020 car theory test.
-added nine new practice multiple-choice video clips, in line with upcoming changes to the car theory test
-added 14 new CGI mock test clips in the hazard perception section of the app, making 34 in total
-updated Study content with the latest advice and information.

PLEASE NOTE: We’ve also made several improvements to the app, if you’re an existing user you'll lose your progress record and your scores will be reset to zero. We apologise for any inconvenience this causes. If you're a new user you’ll be unaffected.

This is the very latest version of the app for 2021. It contains the latest Official DVSA question bank and supporting learning material.

We’ve also fixed a few bugs along the way.
